insert into jm_job_rec_b (opsid, cid, op_dd,sn, dmdel , wk_no, qty, qty_ok, qty_lost, chk_rm_bn, chk_no , process , spc_no ) values
(#{jmJobRecB.opsid}, #{jmJobRecB.cid}, #{jmJobRecB.opDd}, #{jmJobRecB.sn},#{jmJobRecB.dmdel},#{jmJobRecB.wkNo},cast (#{jmJobRecB.qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)), cast (#{jmJobRecB.qtyOk,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)), cast (#{jmJobRecB.qtyLost,jdbcType=DECIMAL} as decimal(22,8)),#{jmJobRecB.chkRmBn}, #{jmJobRecB.chkNo},#{jmJobRecB.process},#{jmJobRecB.spcNo})
mapper.select:
select job.dep,job.jb_no as sid,job.prd_no as prd_no,job.prd_name as prd_name,sum(isnull(recb.qty_ok,0)) as qty from jm_job_rec_b as recb left join jm_job_rec as rec on recb.opsid=rec.opsid left join jm_job as job on job.jb_no=rec.jb_no
and recb.op_dd >= #{begDd}
and recb.op_dd <= #{endDd}
and job.sid like CONCAT('%',#{sid},'%')
and job.dep like CONCAT('%',#{dep},'%')
and job.prd_no like CONCAT('%',#{prdNo},'%')
and job.prd_name like CONCAT('%',#{prdName},'%')
group by job.dep,job.jb_no,job.prd_no,job.prd_name -- order by job.dep,job.jb_no,job.prd_no
ORDER BY ${descOrder} DESC
ORDER BY ${ascOrder} ASC

select job.dep,recb.wk_no,users.usrname as wk_name,job.prd_no,job.prd_name,sum(isnull(recb.qty_ok,0)) as qty from jm_job_rec_b as recb left join jm_job_rec as rec on recb.opsid=rec.opsid left join jm_job as job on job.jb_no=rec.jb_no left join insuser as users on users.codeno=recb.wk_no -- where convert(date,recb.op_dd) between '2020-09-01' and '2020-09-30' and users.usrname='朱顺奎' and job.prd_no='F.D0.W02826'
and recb.op_dd >= #{begDd}
and recb.op_dd <= #{endDd}
and users.usrname like CONCAT('%',#{wkName},'%')
and job.prd_no like CONCAT('%',#{prdNo},'%')
and recb.wk_no like CONCAT('%',#{wkNo},'%')
and job.prd_name like CONCAT('%',#{prdName},'%')
and job.dep like CONCAT('%',#{dep},'%')
group by job.dep,recb.wk_no,users.usrname,job.prd_no,job.prd_name -- order by recb.wk_no,users.usrname,job.prd_no,job.prd_name
ORDER BY ${descOrder} DESC
ORDER BY ${ascOrder} ASC

select rec.rs_no as dev_no,dev.name as dev_name,job.prd_no,job.prd_name,sum(isnull(recb.qty_ok,0)) as qty from jm_job_rec_b as recb left join jm_job_rec as rec on recb.opsid=rec.opsid left join jm_job as job on job.jb_no=rec.jb_no left join jm_dev as dev on rec.rs_no=dev.dev_no -- where convert(date,recb.op_dd) between '2020-09-01' and '2020-09-30' and rec.rs_no='FAF-CC05'
and recb.op_dd >= #{begDd}
and recb.op_dd <= #{endDd}
and rec.rs_no like CONCAT('%',#{devNo},'%')
and job.prd_no like CONCAT('%',#{prdNo},'%')
and dev.name like CONCAT('%',#{devName},'%')
and job.prd_name like CONCAT('%',#{prdName},'%')
and job.dep like CONCAT('%',#{dep},'%')
group by rec.rs_no,dev.name,job.prd_no,job.prd_name -- order by rec.rs_no,dev.name,job.prd_no,job.prd_name
ORDER BY ${descOrder} DESC
ORDER BY ${ascOrder} ASC
